page.title: 02Housing in our D-block
page.content: The{housing}in our D-block is made up of{council}and{private houses.}The majority of them are council houses. These housing schemes were built at different times.The oldest housing scheme is{Riccarton}which is a village in its own right.This community is made up of older people whose outlook differs from those in the other two schemes.{Shortlees}began as a net work of roads which was built by Italian prisoners before the end of the second world war.Local council began to build houses in{Shortlees}about 1946.The newest scheme in our D-block is {Bellfield}which was built about 1952. The government gave tenants the opportunity to buy their council house. A few people have taken this advantage and have done so. Private houses were built on the{Caprington} {Estate}in 1965.
